omopColumns.name: zip
omopColumns.operation_description: Uppercase the postcode then insert the space in the correct location, if needed.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		p.FirstOfNHSNUMBER,
		p.FirstOfPOSTCODE
from omop_staging.RTDS_PASDATA p
where p.FirstOfPOSTCODE is not null
	and p.FirstOfNHSNUMBER is not null;

omopColumns.name: location_source_value
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		p.FirstOfNHSNUMBER,
		p.FirstOfPOSTCODE
from omop_staging.RTDS_PASDATA p
where p.FirstOfPOSTCODE is not null
	and p.FirstOfNHSNUMBER is not null;

omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		p.FirstOfNHSNUMBER,
		p.FirstOfPOSTCODE
from omop_staging.RTDS_PASDATA p
where p.FirstOfPOSTCODE is not null
	and p.FirstOfNHSNUMBER is not null;
